attributes.action: Increase fines for non-disabled drivers parking in disabled parking bays also councils to increase the number of disable parking bays per parking area.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the City of Aberdeen disabled parking is minimal compared to the number of badge holders so to find disabled parking is very hard and frustrating especially when the bays contain non-disabled cars in the few areas provided. Being a blue badge holder it is also frustrating that some of the disabled spaces are for green badge holders only this is a local badge that you have to buy from the council at more expense. From travelling the UK this seems to be a UK wide problem.
